title: The Space Fortress That Came to the Sengoku Era - Novel Updates
tags: Androids   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Samurai   Technological Gap
author: Next To A Firefly   Yokohotaru   横蛍
description:
The Full-Dive VRMMO Sci-Fi simulation  long-time player, Alex, in the last day of Galaxy of Planet, somehow got thrown into the real Sengoku Era along with the constructed space fortress, Silbaan, with one-hundred and twenty organic androids.

There, Alex met Nobunaga and became his retainer arbitrarily.

This is the tale of that Alex and his androids in the Sengoku Era.>
